alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 8:27PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LIGHT ACCUMULATING SNOW WILL CONTINUE IN EAST CENTRAL MINNESOTA WHILE A WINTRY MIX IN NORTHEAST MINNESOTA SWITCHES TO SNOW OVER THE NEXT FEW HOURS... A wintry mix of freezing drizzle and snow flurries is expected to switch over to mainly snow in northeast Minnesota over the next few hours. Up to one inch of snow and an additional light glaze of ice is possible on surfaces. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
